message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do better than an even split. Let's see if you can do better than that.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 64/36 split in your favor, Bob. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
I'm still not convinced that you're getting a fair share. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up my advantage.
